com.edgars.db

Class HBaseSQLManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.edgars.db.HBaseSQLManager

  • public class HBaseSQLManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Class to work with HBase through Apache Phoenix. Created by Edgars on 27/11/2015. Email: edgars_fjodorovs@inbox.lv

                            throws java.sql.SQLException,
